headlines.description: Two goals from Roberto Firmino and another from Sadio Mane saw Liverpool come from a goal down to beat Burnley 4-2 at Anfield.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool win to keep pressure on Man City

headlines.description: Eden Hazard produced a sweet strike in stoppage time to rescue a point in a 1-1 draw against Wolves at Stamford Bridge.

video.headline: Hazard rescues Chelsea with wonderful, late equalizer

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC One Play (Hazard rescues Chelsea with wonderful, late equalizer) 2019/03/10 US ONLY

headlines.description: A goal from Granit Xhaka and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang's penalty saw Arsenal beat Manchester United 2-0 at the Emirates.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal inflict Solskjaer's first league defeat
